name: Peter's Day Out
description:
Peter's Day Out is a short narrative game about a cat searching for the perfect birthday present for his human. Explore the little beach town and help the citizens in this fun, lighthearted adventure.

Keyboard Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move

E or Space to Interact

ESC to pause

Game pad Controls

Left stick or D-pad to move

A or B to interact

Start to pause
